title: RHONJ PREMIERE RECAP! + RHOC & Summer House!
itunes:title: RHONJ PREMIERE RECAP! + RHOC & Summer House!
description:
Danny recaps The Real Housewives of New Jersey PREMIERE, which featured a haunting Luis video, Jennifer struggling to fit in with the group, and a shocking Bill revelation involving a pharmaceutical rep. After Jersey, Danny touches on Summer House and The Real Housewives of Orange County, which found the ladies still on their cast trip as well as a scene no one asked for of the men.


Summer House: 28:00ish

RHOC: 33:00ish


LINKS:
